data.question: What is the title of the article?
data.answer: Anion Control in the Ionothermal Synthesis of Coordination Polymers

data.question: Who is the corresponding author of the paper?
What type of compounds were synthesized in the study?
data.answer: Two anionic 3D coordination frameworks and one 2D layer compound

data.question: Which ionic liquid was used to synthesize compound 1?
What is the role of anions in the ionothermal synthesis according to the text?
data.answer: Anions play a significant role in solvent polarity/hydrophobicity, which in turn controls the structures of materials formed.

data.question: What changes in the coordination geometries of cobalt were observed when the solvent polarity was altered?
data.answer: The coordination geometries of cobalt changed from octahedral in compound 1 to tetrahedral in compound 2.

data.question: What effect does the solvent polarity have on the solubilization of starting materials?
data.answer: Reducing the solvent polarity results in poor solubilization of the starting materials.

data.question: Why is EMIm-Br considered hygroscopic according to the text?
data.answer: EMIm-Br is considered hygroscopic because it contains a significant amount of water even after a moderate drying process.

data.question: How does the presence of water in EMIm-Br affect the crystallization of coordination polymers?
data.answer: The trace of water acts as a mineralizer and is essential for the crystallization of the coordination polymers.

data.question: What was the yield of compound 1 when synthesized?
What is the structural difference between compounds 1 and 2?
data.answer: Compound 1 has a (3,6)-connected net structure, while compound 2 is built from dinuclear Co2 secondary building units arranged in a herringbone packing mode.

data.question: What role does 2,2'-bipyridine play in the synthesis of compound 4?
data.answer: 2,2'-bipyridine acts as a co-ligand to help solubilize the starting materials in the EMIm-Tf2N ionic liquid.

data.question: True or False: The anions of the ionic liquid are incorporated into the resultant materials.
True or False: Compound 3 was synthesized using a mixture of EMIm-Br and EMIm-Tf2N.
True or False: The use of mixed anion ionic liquids does not affect the product selectivity compared to single anion liquids.
True or False: The solvent used for the synthesis of compound 4 was EMIm-Tf2N.
True or False: The ionic liquid anions are incorporated into the resultant materials.
True or False: The synthesis of compound 2 requires a 1:1 molar ratio mixture of EMIm-Br and EMIm-Tf2N.
True or False: The presence of water in the ionic liquid is detrimental to the crystallization of coordination polymers.
True or False: The cations of the ionic liquid are not incorporated into the resultant materials.
